name: Gyudon
ingredients: Sliced ribeye, onions, ginger, soy sauce, mirin, brown sugar, green onions
instructions: Slice onions and mince ginger. Stir fry onions with oil. Mix onions with water with a soy sauce, mirin, brown sugar and ginger. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add beef and simmer for 15 minutes. Top with green onions

name: Steak
ingredients: Steak, Hoisin Sauce, Oyster Sauce, Pepper, Wine, Ginger, Scallion
instructions: Poke holes all over the steak and marinate with hoisin sauce, oyster sauce, pepper, wine, ginger, and scallions. Pan fry the steak for 3 minutes per side for medium-rare.
